So that's the kind of technology that the
Google Mind Mapping and all this sort of stuff

3810.text:
that's being used by these internet conglomerates
to literally mind hack

3818.text:
It's being used or it's being sold to us as a means
of providing our every need

3824.text:
Oh, of course !
We're helping you.

3830.text:
Well, Veronica, in 20 years of the Bases Project
we've had a lot of exposure to outrageous stories

3841.text:
which are beyond science fiction.
What I'm saying is to wake up and smell the coffee

3847.text:
That this is not a science fiction.
There are exceptional technologies which the elite

3854.text:
have got hold of. We have to become educated,
empowered, and fight for our survival

3862.text:
We have a predator that is going to
wipe us all out, everything, every blade of grass

3869.text:
all life is going to be wiped out.
We must act immediately with urgency

3874.text:
the relevant powers that be must decide
if they are going to survive themselves

3882.text:
We have the first degrees, the second degrees,
and third degrees

3887.text:
in that we have the actual elite, criminal . . .
Well, they're not criminals, as such

3894.text:
They are here . . .  whatever brought them here,
and they are going through a strategy for them to survive

3901.text:
That's right
[ Miles: and everything else to be wiped out ]

3904.text:
That's what Nature is all about but they are
going to destroy Nature itself

3908.text:
so they can exist themselves
and from what I understand

3913.text:
they are then going to use our relevant DNAs
between all the species

3921.text:
and go back to the sister and mother planets
and civilisations where we've collectively been

3926.text:
taken from or brought from
and take them out as well

3930.text:
This is about the obliteration, effectively,
of all known life in the universe

3935.text:
and multiple universes, so that this particular lifeform
whatever it is

3945.text:
I am saying that we,
if we're going to survive ourselves,

3951.text:
we have to fight for our survival and do so
with immediate effect

3956.text:
otherwise we will not survive the next 3 or 4,
well maybe 4 or 5 generations

3965.text:
There will be no coming back. We will not be able
to reincarnate. We will be finished. Dead

3971.text: The end of our existence . . .  will happen

3977.text:
We have to take control.
As Monty reminds me, we are the 99%

3985.text:
Only 1% is trying to destroy us.
Now does that make sense to you ?

3992.text:
1% is not trying to destroy us.
1% is using ourselves to destroy us

3999.text:
These people, who are involved in flying the planes
that bombard us with all these chemicals

4009.text:
the chemtrails . . .
how can they live with themselves ?

4016.text:
They don't have a heart, and they're doing
what every species would do

4020.text:
they're dominant. They're becoming dominant
and they're . . .  doing it with the minimum resources

4029.text:
There are not too many of them.
They are getting us to do it to ourselves

4032.text:
and this was demonstrated to me by
one of the people I interviewed

4038.text:
called Alistair, and he explained how in nature
there are small creatures

4046.text:
small insects or other creatures will get
the larger creature to literally walk to the nest

4056.text:
to be eaten.
[ Veronica: Oh God ]

4058.text:
[ Miles: No big fight. They'll inject a hormone
or they'll inject some kind of chemical ]

4063.text:
which takes that creature, in this particular case
a cockroach, a much larger, much more able creature

4072.text:
and the cockroach would literally just be
taken along to the nest

4077.text: to be infused with eggs and eaten

4083.text:
This is in nature. This is not an abnormality.
It's the way the cookie is crumbling

4091.text:
and at the moment our cookie is going to crumble
and we're not going to be around too much longer

4105.text:
Miles, please tell us about your conference
because a lot of us are interested

4110.text:
because you're bringing forward information
we need to know

4115.text:
Well, after 20 years I thought it's probably
a good time, as a pathetically thinly-veiled excuse

4122.text:
to have a conference. So what I've also recognised
is an awful lot of the stuff I've been dealing with

4129.text:
is really bloody awful, oh my God,
kind of stuff

4134.text:
But at a conference, you don't necessarily want
to hear

4137.text:
Oh, my God, we're all going to die,
kind of stuff

4140.text:
and I'm also very reticent to have . . .
I'm the person with all the knowledge

4148.text:
You, down there, will be received.
In the same way that we do, like in a church service

4153.text:
Yeah. No thanks.
[ Miles: I want a much more empathic, cooperative and positive ]

4157.text:
[ Miles: exchange of information and knowledge.
I want to highlight that we knew our ancestors

4163.text:
knew all about the hyper-dimensional
wonderful information from our past

4169.text:
and so we're holding it in Marlborough College
which is in the middle of Wiltshire

4176.text:
It'll be in the summertime, 8-9-10 August
in the Ellis Theatre in Marlborough College

4184.text:
and you'll be able to get tickets from the
Bases Project website

4193.text:
and there's an Event Section there.
You can buy tickets for the Friday

4199.text:
We'll be starting on Friday at 6 o'clock
with a radio show with Sarah Goodly

4204.text:
and the idea is to engage some of the people
that are there

4207.text:
We're going to have the ability of people
who've been on the Bases

4211.text:
anybody who's appeared on the Bases or Ammach
Projects get in for half price !

4217.text:
And we might even have some T shirts, who knows,
maybe as good as this one from the UFO Congress

4222.text:
But, this is about the only good one they've
actually made. A much better design

4226.text:
So the idea then is to get people together.
So we can have nice long lunch breaks

4231.text:
so people can get together and talk.
We're going to have a brilliant Night Watch

4235.text:
with night goggles and stuff like that,
near Nap Hill which is in the Pewsey Valley

4240.text:
and we'll be meeting at The Barge pub
hopefully, at that time

4244.text:
on Friday 8 August after the radio show.
We're going to have some of the Ammach witnesses

4253.text:
who I filmed, anybody I filmed basically,
who's been on camera

4258.text:
can get in for half price
and any individuals who are part of that

4263.text:
who want to update the audience with what's
going on with their lives or their particular case

4268.text:
will be given then an opportunity
in a section called Bases Update

4273.text:
and then we're going to have Mary Rodwell,
the star speaker, we're going to give her 3 hours

4277.text:
to speak about the new children,
and we're going to have David Griffin

4281.text:
talking about 'the black goo'
He's been doing an awful lot of work on that

4286.text:
[ Veronica: People need to know about the 'black goo' ]
He did the initial work on the Falklands War

4291.text:
which the British were getting that as trophy of
war. The 'black goo' came from that source and

4299.text: there'll be a major update on that

4300.text:
And who knows what's going to happen
between now and August

4313.text:
So Veronica, thank you for having me on again.
I hope I've been able to provide some good stuff

4321.text:
[ Veronica: It's always a pleasure, my dear.
Always a pleasure ]

4323.text:
I don't want to scare people but we've got
a scary situation and we've got to deal with it

4327.text:
and I don't want to be too dark about this
but survival is a pretty important issue

4332.text:
and I think the information that has been
revealed in the Bases Project in the last 20 years

4337.text:
and the surrounding information that others
have come up with in those 20 years

4342.text:
is very clear.
We've got to either decide to live or die

4350.text:
And I think we have chosen.
We've made our decision, haven't we ?

4355.text: And let's encourage everybody else to do the same
